entry.tran: 多种族的;多民族和文化的
entry.def: Multiracial means consisting of or involving people of many different nationalities and cultures.

example.ex: We live in a multiracial society.
example.tran: 我们生活在一个多民族的社会里。

means.word_mean: 1. made up of or involving or acting on behalf of various races;
